title: Multi-million-pound collection of supercars seized from the son of Equatorial Guinea's president is auctioned off
text:
Seven Ferraris, a Bugatti Veyron, a McLaren P1 and we are just getting started... The state of Geneva is auctioning off an incredible collection of 25 cars seized from an African politician today.

It’s like a Top Trumps collection of the rarest and fanciest cars you can get your hands on - and almost none of them have been driven more than a few times around the block. This is the sort of spending that must come naturally if your dad is the president of an oil-rich African nation that you one day intend to lead.

As the UK watches its own democracy go through the mangle, we should spare a thought for the people of Equatorial Guinea. President Teodoro Obiang has been in power for more than 40...
description: Seven Ferraris, a Bugatti Veyron, a McLaren P1 and we are just getting started.
